description: This file defines a LightningJS component called 'Home' using the Blits framework. It includes UI elements such as images, text, and buttons, along with associated state, lifecycle hooks, and methods for animations and transitions.

classes.name: Home
classes.description: A LightningJS component representing the homepage with animated logo, loader, text, and button.

methods.name: rotateColors
methods.description: Method to cycle through a predefined list of colors for the loader component.
